member.name: T:NetStone.Constants
member.summary: Contains constants used for initializing the Lodestone parser.

member.name: F:NetStone.Constants.LodestoneBase
member.summary: Base URL for the Lodestone website.

member.name: T:NetStone.Definitions.DefinitionsContainer
member.summary: Class providing definitions(Selectors, paths) for parsing lodestone content.

member.name: T:NetStone.LodestoneClient
member.summary: The main Lodestone client class offering parsed information and search.

member.name: P:NetStone.LodestoneClient.Definitions
member.summary: Container holding information about the current Lodestone layout, needed to parse responses.

member.name: P:NetStone.LodestoneClient.Data
member.summary: The service providing game data to the Lodestone parser.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.#ctor(NetStone.Definitions.DefinitionsContainer,NetStone.GameData.IGameDataProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Initialize a new Lodestone client with default options.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.GetCharacter(System.String)
member.summary: Get a character by its Lodestone ID.
member.returns: class containing information about the character.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.GetCharacterClassJob(System.String)
member.summary: Get a characters' class/job information by its Lodestone ID. You can also get this from the character directly by calling .
member.returns: class containing information about the characters' classes and jobs.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.GetCharacterAchievement(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a characters' unlocked achievement information by its Lodestone ID. You can also get this from the character directly by calling .
member.param: The number of the page that should be fetched.
member.returns: class containing information about the characters' achievements.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.GetCharacterMount(System.String)
member.summary: Get a characters' unlocked mount information by its Lodestone ID. You can also get this from the character directly by calling .
member.returns: class containing information about the characters' mounts.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.GetCharacterMinion(System.String)
member.summary: Get a characters' unlocked minion information by its Lodestone ID. You can also get this from the character directly by calling .
member.returns: class containing information about the characters' minions.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.SearchCharacter(NetStone.Search.Character.CharacterSearchQuery,System.Int32)
member.summary: Search lodestone for a character with the specified query.
member.param: The page of search results to fetch.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.GetFreeCompany(System.String)
member.summary: Get a character by its Lodestone ID.
member.returns: class containing information about the character.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.GetFreeCompanyMembers(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the members of a Free Company
member.param: The ID of the free company.
The page of members to fetch.
member.returns: class containing information about FC members.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.SearchFreeCompany(NetStone.Search.FreeCompany.FreeCompanySearchQuery,System.Int32)
member.summary: Search lodestone for a free company with the specified query.
member.param: The page of search results to fetch.

member.name: M:NetStone.LodestoneClient.GetParsed``1(System.String,System.Func{HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode,``0},NetStone.UserAgent)
member.summary: Get the instantiated LodestoneParseable if the request succeeded, or null in case of StatusCode.NotFound.
member.param: The user agent to use for the request.
member.returns: The instantiated LodestoneParseable in case of success.
